extracted_playbook.condition: Which version of EcoStruxure Power Build Rapsody is installed?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Version NL v2.7.2
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install EcoStruxure Power Build Rapsody Version NL v2.7.2 to fix the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Version FR v2.7.12
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install EcoStruxure Power Build Rapsody Version FR v2.7.12 to fix the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Version ES v2.7.52
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install EcoStruxure Power Build Rapsody Version ES v2.7.52 to fix the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Immediate Mitigations for INT Version
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the following mitigations: Only open projects from trusted sources, ensure malware scans before opening externally created projects, encrypt project files, use secure communication protocols, and compute a hash of project files to verify integrity.

extracted_playbook.title: Reboot the System
extracted_playbook.description: Reboot the system after installing the new version to ensure all changes take effect.

affected_products: EcoStruxure Power Build Rapsody Versions v2.5.2 NL and prior
EcoStruxure Power Build Rapsody Versions v2.7.1 FR and prior
EcoStruxure Power Build Rapsody Versions v2.7.5 ES and prior
